QuestData.Title: Crazy Larry
QuestData.Description: You're gettin' it, $n. You scratch my back, I scratch yours. Well, more like I scratch the back of your whole army, and just a little harder than the backs of the other side! Was that too complicated?$B$BWhat I'm sayin' is, that's a lot of backs. So I'm gonna have to ask you to scratch mine a few more times. Whoever stole those landmines may have just hit our boys on the eastern shore.$B$BHead to our camp to the southeast and check on Crazy Larry; he'll fill you in when you get there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Crazy Larry to the southeast of Bogpaddle.
QuestData.RewardText: Silversnap sent you?! I'm DOOMED!$B$BOh, he sent you to help me! That's different, haha!
